name: NFT Metadata Proxy
description: An API proxy for protecting NFT metadata with caching

CONTRACT_ADDRESS.description: Ethereum address for the NFT Smart Contract

ETHEREUM_RPC_URL.description: An endpoint for an Ethereum RPC provider, e.g. [Infura](https://infura.io/) or [Alchemy](https://www.alchemy.com/)

SOURCE_BASE_URI.description: The base url for your full source metadata, don't forget the trailing `/`
